content: I'll definitely keep that in mind. I'll create the event page and post about the need for instructors or facilitators, and make sure to include all the necessary details and incentives. I'll also encourage my friends to share the post and reach out to their networks. Since I have a strong online presence, I'm hoping to get some good responses. With 500 friends on Facebook, I'm confident that I can find the right instructors or facilitators for my event. Do you have any tips on how to screen or evaluate the responses I receive from potential instructors or facilitators?
